query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 O Simon mago, o miseri seguaci 2 che le cose di Dio, che di bontate 3 deon essere spose, e voi rapaci
query.error: **English:** 1 O Simon Magus, O wretched followers, 2 who the things of God, which ought to be brides of goodness, 3 you make them harlots.
query.result: 1 Wahai Simon Magus, wahai pengikut-pengikut yang celaka, 2 yang menjadikan hal-hal Tuhan, yang seharusnya menjadi mempelai kebaikan, 3 kamu jadikan mereka pelacur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 per oro e per argento avolterate, 5 or convien che per voi suoni la tromba, 6 però che ne la terza bolgia state.
query.error: **English:** 4 For gold and silver you have prostituted them, 5 now it is right that the trumpet sound for you, 6 because you are in the third chasm.
query.result: 4 Demi emas dan perak kamu telah melacurkan mereka, 5 sekarang sudah sepantasnya terompet berbunyi untukmu, 6 karena kamu berada di jurang ketiga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Già eravamo, a la seguente tomba, 8 montati de lo scoglio in quella parte 9 ch’a punto sovra mezzo ’l fosso piomba.
query.error: **English:** 7 We were already, at the next tomb, 8 climbed up the cliff on that side 9 which plumbs down exactly over the middle of the ditch.
query.result: 7 Kami sudah berada, di makam berikutnya, 8 memanjat tebing di sisi itu 9 yang tepat di atas tengah parit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 O somma sapïenza, quanta è l’arte 11 che mostri in cielo, in terra e nel mal mondo, 12 e quanto giusto tua virtù comparte!
query.error: **English:** 10 O supreme wisdom, how great is the art 11 that you show in heaven, on earth, and in the evil world, 12 and how justly your virtue is shared!
query.result: 10 Wahai kebijaksanaan tertinggi, betapa hebatnya seni 11 yang kau tunjukkan di langit, di bumi, dan di dunia yang jahat, 12 dan betapa adilnya kebajikan-Mu dibagikan!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Io vidi per le coste e per lo fondo 14 piena la pietra livida di fóri, 15 d’un largo tutti e ciascun era tondo.
query.error: **English:** 13 I saw along the slopes and at the bottom 14 the livid stone full of holes, 15 each one large and all of them round.
query.result: 13 Aku melihat di sepanjang lereng dan di dasar 14 batu berwarna pucat yang penuh dengan lubang, 15 masing-masing besar dan semuanya bundar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Non mi parean men ampi né maggiori 17 che que’ che son nel mio bel San Giovanni, 18 fatti per loco d’i battezzatori;
query.error: **English:** 16 They do not seem to me either larger nor smaller 17 than those that are in my fair San Giovanni, 18 made for the place of the baptizers;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 l’un de li quali, ancor non è molt’ anni, 20 rupp’ io per un che dentro v’annegava: 21 e questo sia suggel ch’ogn’ omo sganni.
query.error: **English:** 19 one of which, not many years ago, 20 I broke because of someone who was drowning inside it: 21 and let this be a seal that will undeceive everyone.
query.result: 19 salah satunya, belum lama ini, 20 kurusak karena seseorang yang tenggelam di dalamnya: 21 dan biarlah ini menjadi meterai yang akan menyadarkan setiap orang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Fuor de la bocca a ciascun soperchiava 23 d’un peccator li piedi e de le gambe 24 infino al grosso, e l’altro dentro stava.
query.error: **English:** 22 Outside of the mouth of each one protruded 23 the feet and legs of a sinner 24 up to the thick part, and the rest of him was inside.
query.result: 22 Di luar mulut masing-masing menonjol 23 kaki dan betis seorang pendosa 24 hingga ke bagian yang tebal, dan sisanya berada di dalam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Le piante erano a tutti accese intrambe; 26 per che sì forte guizzavan le giunte, 27 che spezzate averien ritorte e strambe.
query.error: **English:** 25 The plants were all on fire, both of them; 26 because the joints crackled so loudly, 27 that they would have broken twisted and strange ropes.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Qual suole il fiammeggiar de le cose unte 29 muoversi pur su per la strema buccia, 30 tal era lì dai calcagni a le punte.
query.error: **English:** 28 As the flickering of oily things is wont to move 29 even on the outermost surface, 30 so were they moving there from heels to toes.
query.result: 28 Seperti kerlipan benda-benda yang berminyak 29 bergerak bahkan di permukaan yang paling luar, 30 begitulah mereka di sana dari tumit hingga ujung kaki.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 «Chi è colui, maestro, che si cruccia 32 guizzando più che li altri suoi consorti», 33 diss’ io, «e cui più roggia fiamma succia?».
query.error: **English:** 31 "Who is that, master, who writhes 32 more than his other companions," 33 I said, "and who sucks up more of the red flame?"
query.result: 31 "Siapakah dia, guru, yang meronta-ronta 32 lebih dari teman-temannya yang lain," 33 kataku, "dan yang menghisap lebih banyak api merah?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ed elli a me: «Se tu vuo’ ch’i’ ti porti 35 là giù per quella ripa che più giace, 36 da lui saprai di sé e de’ suoi torti».
query.error: **English:** 34 And he to me: "If you wish for me to carry you 35 down there to that lower slope, 36 from him you will learn about himself and his sins."
query.result: 34 Dan dia kepadaku: "Jika kamu ingin aku menggendongmu 35 ke bawah sana ke lereng yang lebih rendah, 36 darinya kamu akan belajar tentang dirinya dan dosanya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 E io: «Tanto m’è bel, quanto a te piace: 38 tu se’ segnore, e sai ch’i’ non mi parto 39 dal tuo volere, e sai quel che si tace».
query.error: **English:** 37 And I: "It pleases me as much as it pleases you: 38 you are the master, and you know that I do not depart 39 from your will, and you know what is left unsaid."
query.result: 37 Dan aku: "Begitulah yang kusukai, sebagaimana yang kauinginkan: 38 engkaulah tuannya, dan kau tahu bahwa aku tidak akan menyimpang 39 dari keinginanmu, dan kau tahu apa yang tidak terucapkan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Allor venimmo in su l’argine quarto; 41 volgemmo e discendemmo a mano stanca 42 là giù nel fondo foracchiato e arto.
query.error: **English:** 40 Then we came to the fourth bank; 41 we turned and descended on the left hand 42 down there to the perforated and rough bottom.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Lo buon maestro ancor de la sua anca 44 non mi dipuose, sì mi giunse al rotto 45 di quel che si piangeva con la zanca.
query.error: **English:** 43 The good master still did not set me down from his hip, 44 thus he brought me to the edge 45 of what was being lamented with the leg.
query.result: 43 Guru yang baik itu masih tidak menurunkan aku dari pinggangnya, 44 demikianlah ia membawaku ke tepi 45 dari apa yang sedang diratapi dengan kaki.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 «O qual che se’ che ’l di sù tien di sotto, 47 anima trista come pal commessa», 48 comincia’ io a dir, «se puoi, fa motto».
query.error: **English:** 46 "O whoever you are, who hold upside down 47 your wretched soul, like a stake driven in the ground," 48 I began to say, "if you can, speak."
query.result: 46 "Wahai siapa pun kamu yang memegang terbalik 47 jiwamu yang malang, seperti pasak yang ditancapkan di tanah," 48 mulailah aku berkata, "jika kamu bisa, bicara."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Io stava come ’l frate che confessa 50 lo perfido assessin, che, poi ch’è fitto, 51 richiama lui per che la morte cessa.
query.error: **English:** 49 I stood like the friar who confesses 50 the treacherous assassin who, after he is stabbed, 51 calls out to him so that death may cease.
query.result: 49 Aku berdiri seperti rahib yang mengakui dosa 50 pembunuh berdarah dingin, yang setelah ditikam, 51 memanggilnya agar kematian berhenti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Ed el gridò: «Se’ tu già costì ritto, 53 se’ tu già costì ritto, Bonifazio? 54 Di parecchi anni mi mentì lo scritto.
query.error: **English:** 52 And he cried out: "Are you already standing there, 53 are you already standing there, Boniface? 54 The inscription lied to me by many years.
query.result: 52 Dan dia berseru: "Apakah kamu sudah berdiri di sana, 53 apakah kamu sudah berdiri di sana, Bonifasius? 54 Prasasti itu telah membohongiku selama bertahun-tahun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Se’ tu sì tosto di quell’ aver sazio 56 per lo qual non temesti tòrre a ’nganno 57 la bella donna, e poi di farne strazio?».
query.error: **English:** 55 If you are so quickly sated with that possession 56 for which you did not fear to deceive 57 the beautiful lady, and then to make her suffer?
query.result: 55 Jika kamu begitu cepat merasa puas dengan kepemilikan itu 56 yang karenanya kamu tidak takut untuk menipu 57 wanita cantik itu, dan kemudian menyiksanya?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Tal mi fec’ io, quai son color che stanno, 59 per non intender ciò ch’è lor risposto, 60 quasi scornati, e risponder non sanno.
query.error: **English:** 58 Such I made myself, like those who stand still, 59 not understanding what is answered to them, 60 almost scorned, and they do not know how to answer.
query.result: 58 Begitulah yang kulakukan, seperti mereka yang berdiri diam, 59 tidak mengerti apa yang dijawab kepada mereka, 60 hampir dicemooh, dan mereka tidak tahu bagaimana menjawab.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Allor Virgilio disse: «Dilli tosto: 62 “Non son colui, non son colui che credi”»; 63 e io rispuosi come a me fu imposto.
query.error: **English:** 61 Then Virgil said: "Say quickly: 62 'I am not he, I am not he whom you think'"; 63 and I answered as I was instructed.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Per che lo spirto tutti storse i piedi; 65 poi, sospirando e con voce di pianto, 66 mi disse: «Dunque che a me richiedi?
query.error: **English:** 64 Because of which the spirit twisted all its feet; 65 then, sighing and with a voice of weeping, 66 it said to me: "So what do you ask of me?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Se di saper ch’i’ sia ti cal cotanto, 68 che tu abbi però la ripa corsa, 69 sappi ch’i’ fui vestito del gran manto;
query.error: **English:** 67 If you are so eager to know who I am, 68 that you have therefore run the bank, 69 know that I was clothed in the great mantle;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 e veramente fui figliuol de l’orsa, 71 cupido sì per avanzar li orsatti, 72 che sù l’avere e qui me misi in borsa.
query.error: **English:** 70 and truly I was the son of the bear, 71 so eager to surpass the bear cubs, 72 that I put money and myself in my purse up there.
query.result: 70 dan sesungguhnya aku adalah anak beruang, 71 begitu bersemangat untuk melampaui anak-anak beruang lainnya, 72 sehingga aku menaruh uang dan diriku sendiri di dalam dompetku di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Di sotto al capo mio son li altri tratti 74 che precedetter me simoneggiando, 75 per le fessure de la pietra piatti.
query.error: **English:** 73 Beneath my head are the other levels 74 that preceded me, following Simon, 75 through the flat crevices of the rock.
query.result: 73 Di bawah kepalaku terdapat tingkat-tingkat lainnya 74 yang mendahuluiku, mengikuti Simon, 75 melalui celah-celah batu yang datar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Là giù cascherò io altresì quando 77 verrà colui ch’i’ credea che tu fossi, 78 allor ch’i’ feci ’l sùbito dimando.
query.error: **English:** 76 There I too shall fall when 77 he comes whom I believed you to be, 78 at the time when I made the sudden demand.
query.result: 76 Di sana aku juga akan jatuh ketika 77 datanglah dia yang kupercaya sebagai dirimu, 78 saat itulah aku mengajukan pertanyaan yang tiba-tiba itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Ma più è ’l tempo già che i piè mi cossi 80 e ch’i’ son stato così sottosopra, 81 ch’el non starà piantato coi piè rossi:
query.error: **English:** 79 But the time is already more past when I wore out my feet 80 and when I have been so upside down, 81 that he will not stand planted with red feet:
query.result: 79 Tetapi waktu sudah lebih lama berlalu ketika kakiku lelah 80 dan ketika aku sudah sangat kacau, 81 sehingga dia tidak akan berdiri tegak dengan kaki merah:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 ché dopo lui verrà di più laida opra, 83 di ver’ ponente, un pastor sanza legge, 84 tal che convien che lui e me ricuopra.
query.error: **English:** 82 for after him will come a more wicked deed, 83 from the true west, a shepherd without law, 84 such that it is fitting that he and I be covered up.
query.result: 82 karena setelah dia akan datang perbuatan yang lebih jahat, 83 dari barat yang sebenarnya, seorang gembala tanpa hukum, 84 sehingga sudah sepantasnya dia dan aku ditutupi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Nuovo Iasón sarà, di cui si legge 86 ne’ Maccabei; e come a quel fu molle 87 suo re, così fia lui chi Francia regge».
query.error: **English:** 85 He will be a new Jason, of whom one reads 86 in the Maccabees; and as his king was weak 87 toward him, so will be he who rules France.
query.result: 85 Dia akan menjadi seorang Jason yang baru, yang mana dapat dibaca 86 di dalam Kitab Makabe; dan sebagaimana rajanya bersikap lemah 87 terhadapnya, demikian juga dia yang memerintah Prancis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Io non so s’i’ mi fui qui troppo folle, 89 ch’i’ pur rispuosi lui a questo metro: 90 «Deh, or mi dì: quanto tesoro volle
query.error: **English:** 88 I do not know if I was too mad here, 89 for I answered him in this manner: 90 "Ah, now tell me: how much treasure did
query.result: 88 Aku tidak tahu apakah aku terlalu gila di sini, 89 karena aku menjawabnya dengan cara ini: 90 "Ah, sekarang katakan padaku: berapa banyak harta yang

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Nostro Segnore in prima da san Pietro 92 ch’ei ponesse le chiavi in sua balìa? 93 Certo non chiese se non “Viemmi retro”.
query.error: **English:** 91 Our Lord demand from Saint Peter 92 before he placed the keys in his power? 93 Surely he asked nothing more than 'Follow me'."
query.result: 91 Tuhan kita minta dari Santo Petrus 92 sebelum dia menyerahkan kunci-kunci kepadanya? 93 Tentu saja dia tidak meminta apa-apa selain 'Ikutlah aku'."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Né Pier né li altri tolsero a Matia 95 oro od argento, quando fu sortito 96 al loco che perdé l’anima ria.
query.error: **English:** 94 Neither Pier nor the others took from Matia 95 gold or silver, when he was assigned 96 to the place that the wicked soul lost.
query.result: 94 Baik Pier mahupun yang lain tidak mengambil dari Matia 95 emas atau perak, ketika dia ditugaskan 96 ke tempat yang hilang oleh jiwa yang jahat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Però ti sta, ché tu se’ ben punito; 98 e guarda ben la mal tolta moneta 99 ch’esser ti fece contra Carlo ardito.
query.error: **English:** 97 However, stand still, for you are well punished; 98 and look well at the ill-gotten money 99 that made you so bold against Charles.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 E se non fosse ch’ancor lo mi vieta 101 la reverenza de le somme chiavi 102 che tu tenesti ne la vita lieta,
query.error: **English:** 100 And if it were not that reverence for the supreme keys 101 which you hold in the joyful life still forbids me, 102 I would use even graver words;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 io userei parole ancor più gravi; 104 ché la vostra avarizia il mondo attrista, 105 calcando i buoni e sollevando i pravi.
query.error: **English:** 103 I would use even harsher words; 104 for your avarice saddens the world, 105 trampling the good and exalting the wicked.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Di voi pastor s’accorse il Vangelista, 107 quando colei che siede sopra l’acque 108 puttaneggiar coi regi a lui fu vista;
query.error: **English:** 106 Of you the Evangelist was aware, 107 when he saw her who sits upon the waters 108 fornicate with the kings;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 quella che con le sette teste nacque, 110 e da le diece corna ebbe argomento, 111 fin che virtute al suo marito piacque.
query.error: **English:** 109 she who was born with seven heads 110 and from the ten horns had argument, 111 until virtue pleased her husband.
query.result: 109 dia yang lahir dengan tujuh kepala 110 dan dari sepuluh tanduk mendapat argumen, 111 sampai kebajikan menyenangkan suaminya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Fatto v’avete dio d’oro e d’argento; 113 e che altro è da voi a l’idolatre, 114 se non ch’elli uno, e voi ne orate cento?
query.error: **English:** 112 You have made yourselves gods of gold and silver; 113 and what is the difference between you and the idolaters, 114 except that they worship one, and you a hundred?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Ahi, Costantin, di quanto mal fu matre, 116 non la tua conversion, ma quella dote 117 che da te prese il primo ricco patre!».
query.error: **English:** 115 Ah, Constantine, of how much evil was the mother, 116 not your conversion, but that dowry 117 that the first rich father received from you!
query.result: 115 Ah, Constantine, betapa banyak kejahatan yang menjadi ibu, 116 bukan pertobatanmu, tetapi mas kawin itu 117 yang diterima ayah kaya pertama darimu!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 E mentr’ io li cantava cotai note, 119 o ira o coscïenza che ’l mordesse, 120 forte spingava con ambo le piote.
query.error: **English:** 118 And while I sang such notes to them, 119 either anger or conscience that bit him, 120 he pushed hard with both his paws.
query.result: 118 Dan sementara aku menyanyikan nada-nada seperti itu kepada mereka, 119 entah amarah atau hati nurani yang menggigitnya, 120 dia mendorong dengan kuat dengan kedua kakinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 I’ credo ben ch’al mio duca piacesse, 122 con sì contenta labbia sempre attese 123 lo suon de le parole vere espresse.
query.error: **English:** 121 I believe well that it pleased my guide, 122 with such a joyful countenance he always awaited 123 the sound of the true words expressed.
query.result: 121 Aku percaya dengan baik bahwa pemanduku senang, 122 dengan wajah yang begitu gembira dia selalu menunggu 123 bunyi dari kata-kata benar yang diucapkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Però con ambo le braccia mi prese; 125 e poi che tutto su mi s’ebbe al petto, 126 rimontò per la via onde discese.
query.error: **English:** 124 But he seized me with both his arms; 125 and after he had me all to his chest, 126 he climbed back up the way he had come down.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Né si stancò d’avermi a sé distretto, 128 sì men portò sovra ’l colmo de l’arco 129 che dal quarto al quinto argine è tragetto.
query.error: **English:** 127 Nor did he tire of holding me close to him, 128 thus he carried me over the summit of the arch 129 that is the passage from the fourth to the fifth embankment.
query.result: 127 Dia tidak lelah memelukku erat, 128 demikianlah dia membawaku ke puncak lengkungan 129 yang merupakan jalan dari tanggul keempat ke tanggul kelima.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Quivi soavemente spuose il carco, 131 soave per lo scoglio sconcio ed erto 132 che sarebbe a le capre duro varco.
query.error: **English:** 130 There he gently put down his burden, 131 gently because of the rough and steep cliff 132 that would be a hard passage even for goats.
query.result: 130 Di sana dengan lembut dia menurunkan bebannya, 131 lembut karena tebing yang kasar dan curam 132 yang akan menjadi jalan yang sulit bahkan untuk kambing.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Indi un altro vallon mi fu scoperto.
query.error: **English:** 133 Then another valley was revealed to me.
query.result: 133 Kemudian lembah lain terlihat olehku.
